author: Special Correspondent
text:
A ninth standard girl of a Government School was reportedly found in an inebriated state on Friday.

On Friday, the class teacher found that the student had soft drinks mixed with liquor in a bottle in her bag.

She alerted the headmaster who informed the parents. She was sent home. School Education Department officials conducted an enquiry over the incident. A top official said, “We have to ascertain what led her to do this. She might have indulged in the act due to peer pressure.” or inspired by characters shown in films. Anyhow, this issue has to be handled with much care. Appropriate remedial measure will be taken to correct the child.”
title: Schoolgirl found drunk
